languages.text: "А этот узор..." {n}Кибелла указывает на едва заметную цепочку алых капель.{/n} "Он начертан с яростным отчаянием. Оставивший его был ранен, но не бежал. Давал отпор, пока мог, а после ушел... во тьму..." {n}Кибелла прикрывает глаза, умолкает, а затем резко выдыхает и указывает стальным когтем направление:{/n} "...во тьму служебных тоннелей, что спрятаны за стенами святилища".

traits.locale_text: "А этот след..." {n}Кибелла указывает на едва заметную цепочку алых капель.{/n} "Беспорядочный и яростный, но от него веет страхом. Оставивший его не был обучен убивать. Он не блюститель — налетчик. Кровь тянется во тьму, он пришел из нее и ушел туда же. Тесная тропа, сокрытая — служебные тоннели за стенами святилища... Возможно, его ранили. Возможно, то кровь его жертвы оросила убийцу".

languages.text: "As for this pattern..." {n}Kibellah points to a barely visible chain of scarlet droplets.{/n} "It was made in fury and desperation. The one who left it was wounded, but they did not flee. They fought back while they could, and then they retreated... into the darkness..." {n}Kibellah's eyes close and she falls silent, then she exhales sharply and points a steel claw:{/n} "...into the darkness of the maintenance tunnels hidden within the walls of the shrine."
languages.original_text: "А этот узор..." {n}Кибелла указывает на едва заметную цепочку алых капель.{/n} "Он начертан с яростным отчаянием. Оставивший его был ранен, но не бежал. Давал отпор, пока мог, а после ушел... во тьму..." {n}Кибелла прикрывает глаза, умолкает, а затем резко выдыхает и указывает стальным когтем направление:{/n} "...во тьму служебных тоннелей, что спрятаны за стенами святилища".

traits.locale_text: "As for this pattern..." {n}Kibellah points to a barely visible chain of scarlet droplets.{/n} "It was made in fury and desperation. The one who left it was wounded, but they did not flee. They fought back while they could, and then they retreated... into the darkness..." {n}Kibellah's eyes close and she falls silent, then she exhales sharply and points a steel claw:{/n} "...into the darkness of the maintenance tunnels hidden within the walls of the shrine."

"As for this trace..." {n}Kibellah points to a barely visible chain of scarlet droplets.{/n}. "Disorderly and violent. It was left by an attacker. He was frightened. Nervous. He was not trained to kill. And he came from the maintenance tunnels behind the walls of the sanctuary. He then left through them as well. Perhaps he was wounded. Perhaps the blood of his victim splattered the killer."

"As for this pattern..." {n}Kibellah points to a barely visible chain of scarlet droplets.{/n} "It was made in fury and desperation. The one who left it was wounded, but they did not flee. They fought back while they could, and then they retreated... into the darkness..." {n}Kibellah's eyes close and she falls silent, then she exhales sharply and points a steel claw:{/n} "...into the darkness of the maintenance tunnels hidden within the walls of the shrine."

"As for this trace..." {n}Kibellah points to a barely visible chain of scarlet droplets.{/n}. "It is disorderly and violent, and clearly left by an attacker. He was frightened. Nervous. He was not trained to kill. He came from the maintenance tunnels behind the walls of the sanctuary, and he likewise left through them. Perhaps he was wounded. Perhaps the blood of his victim splattered on the killer."

"As for this pattern..." {n}Kibellah points to a barely visible chain of scarlet droplets.{/n} "It was made in fury and desperation. The one who left it was wounded, but they did not flee. They fought back while they could, and then they retreated... into the darkness..." {n}Kibellah's eyes close and she falls silent, then she exhales sharply and points a steel claw:{/n} "...into the darkness of the maintenance tunnels hidden within the walls of the shrine."

"As for this pattern..." {n}Kibellah points to a barely visible chain of scarlet droplets.{/n} "It was made in fury and desperation. The one who left it was wounded, but they did not flee. They fought back while they could, and then they retreated... into the darkness..." {n}Kibellah's eyes close and she falls silent, then she exhales sharply and points a steel claw:{/n} "...into the darkness of the maintenance tunnels hidden within the walls of the shrine."

"As for this pattern..." {n}Kibellah points to a barely visible chain of scarlet droplets.{/n} "It was made in fury and desperation. The one who left it was wounded, but they did not flee. They fought back while they could, and then they retreated... into the darkness..." {n}Kibellah's eyes close and she falls silent, then she exhales sharply and points a steel claw:{/n} "...into the darkness of the maintenance tunnels hidden within the walls of the shrine."

languages.text: "Was dieses Muster angeht ..." {n}Kibellah deutet auf eine kaum sichtbare Kette von Blutstropfen.{/n} "Ich sehe Wut und Verzweiflung. Wer sie hinterließ, war verwundet, floh aber nicht. Er wehrte sich, solange er konnte und zog sich dann ... in die Dunkelheit zurück ..." {n}Kibellah schließt die Augen und verstummt. Dann atmet sie scharf aus und hebt eine stählerne Klaue:{/n} "... in die Dunkelheit der in den Mauern des Schreins verborgenen Wartungstunnel."
languages.original_text: "As for this pattern..." {n}Kibellah points to a barely visible chain of scarlet droplets.{/n} "It was made in fury and desperation. The one who left it was wounded, but they did not flee. They fought back while they could, and then they retreated... into the darkness..." {n}Kibellah's eyes close and she falls silent, then she exhales sharply and points a steel claw:{/n} "...into the darkness of the maintenance tunnels hidden within the walls of the shrine."

traits.locale_text: "Was dieses Muster angeht ..." {n}Kibellah deutet auf eine kaum sichtbare Kette von Blutstropfen.{/n} "Ich sehe Wut und Verzweiflung. Wer sie hinterließ, war verwundet, floh aber nicht. Er wehrte sich, solange er konnte und zog sich dann ... in die Dunkelheit zurück ..." {n}Kibellah schließt die Augen und verstummt. Dann atmet sie scharf aus und hebt eine stählerne Klaue:{/n} "... in die Dunkelheit der in den Mauern des Schreins verborgenen Wartungstunnel."

languages.text: «En cuanto a este trazo...». {n}Kibellah señala una cadena casi imperceptible de gotitas de color escarlata.{/n} «Es violento, nada metódico. Quien lo hiciera estaba herido, pero no huyó. Se defendió mientras pudo y luego se adentró... a las profundidades...». {n}Kibellah cierra los ojos y se calla, luego exhala y señala a una garra de acero:{/n} «... a las profundidades de los túneles de mantenimiento que se esconden en los muros del santuario».
languages.original_text: "As for this pattern..." {n}Kibellah points to a barely visible chain of scarlet droplets.{/n} "It was made in fury and desperation. The one who left it was wounded, but they did not flee. They fought back while they could, and then they retreated... into the darkness..." {n}Kibellah's eyes close and she falls silent, then she exhales sharply and points a steel claw:{/n} "...into the darkness of the maintenance tunnels hidden within the walls of the shrine."

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto a este trazo...». {n}Kibellah señala una cadena casi imperceptible de gotitas de color escarlata.{/n} «Es violento, nada metódico. Quien lo hiciera estaba herido, pero no huyó. Se defendió mientras pudo y luego se adentró... a las profundidades...». {n}Kibellah cierra los ojos y se calla, luego exhala y señala a una garra de acero:{/n} «... a las profundidades de los túneles de mantenimiento que se esconden en los muros del santuario».

languages.text: 「この模様は…」{n}キベラは、かろうじて見える緋色のしずくによる鎖を指差す。{/n}「怒りと絶望の中で作られたものです。これを残した者は負傷していましたが、逃げはしなかった。可能な限り抵抗して、そして退却した…暗闇の中へと…」{n}キベラが目を閉じ、沈黙する。そして、彼女は鋭く息を吐くと、鋼の爪で指さした。{/n}「…神殿の壁の中に隠された、メンテナンス・トンネルの暗闇の中へ」
languages.original_text: "As for this pattern..." {n}Kibellah points to a barely visible chain of scarlet droplets.{/n} "It was made in fury and desperation. The one who left it was wounded, but they did not flee. They fought back while they could, and then they retreated... into the darkness..." {n}Kibellah's eyes close and she falls silent, then she exhales sharply and points a steel claw:{/n} "...into the darkness of the maintenance tunnels hidden within the walls of the shrine."

traits.locale_text: 「この模様は…」{n}キベラは、かろうじて見える緋色のしずくによる鎖を指差す。{/n}「怒りと絶望の中で作られたものです。これを残した者は負傷していましたが、逃げはしなかった。可能な限り抵抗して、そして退却した…暗闇の中へと…」{n}キベラが目を閉じ、沈黙する。そして、彼女は鋭く息を吐くと、鋼の爪で指さした。{/n}「…神殿の壁の中に隠された、メンテナンス・トンネルの暗闇の中へ」

languages.text: “至于这个图案……”{n}绮贝菈指着一条点点滴滴的血迹，你几乎看不清楚。{/n}“这是在愤怒与绝望之中留下来的血迹。那个人受了伤，离开了这里，但那个人并不是在仓皇逃窜。那个人尽可能地进行反击，之后撤退了……消失在了黑暗之中……”{n}绮贝菈闭上双眼，沉默片刻，之后猛地呼出一口气，用钢爪指着目标的方向。{/n}“……藏在了圣殿墙壁内部的维修隧道里。”
languages.original_text: "As for this pattern..." {n}Kibellah points to a barely visible chain of scarlet droplets.{/n} "It was made in fury and desperation. The one who left it was wounded, but they did not flee. They fought back while they could, and then they retreated... into the darkness..." {n}Kibellah's eyes close and she falls silent, then she exhales sharply and points a steel claw:{/n} "...into the darkness of the maintenance tunnels hidden within the walls of the shrine."

traits.locale_text: “至于这个图案……”{n}绮贝菈指着一条点点滴滴的血迹，你几乎看不清楚。{/n}“这是在愤怒与绝望之中留下来的血迹。那个人受了伤，离开了这里，但那个人并不是在仓皇逃窜。那个人尽可能地进行反击，之后撤退了……消失在了黑暗之中……”{n}绮贝菈闭上双眼，沉默片刻，之后猛地呼出一口气，用钢爪指着目标的方向。{/n}“……藏在了圣殿墙壁内部的维修隧道里。”

languages.text: « Quant à ce motif... {n}Kibellah désigne une succession de gouttelettes écarlates à peine visibles.{/n} Il a été tracé avec fureur et désespoir. Son auteur était blessé, mais il n'a pas pris la fuite pour autant. Il s'est battu jusqu'au bout avant de se replier... dans les ténèbres... » {n}Kibellah ferme les yeux et sombre dans le silence, puis elle expire bruyamment et tend une griffe d'acier :{/n} « ... dans les ténèbres des tunnels de maintenance dissimulés derrière les cloisons du sanctuaire. »
languages.original_text: "As for this pattern..." {n}Kibellah points to a barely visible chain of scarlet droplets.{/n} "It was made in fury and desperation. The one who left it was wounded, but they did not flee. They fought back while they could, and then they retreated... into the darkness..." {n}Kibellah's eyes close and she falls silent, then she exhales sharply and points a steel claw:{/n} "...into the darkness of the maintenance tunnels hidden within the walls of the shrine."

traits.locale_text: « Quant à ce motif... {n}Kibellah désigne une succession de gouttelettes écarlates à peine visibles.{/n} Il a été tracé avec fureur et désespoir. Son auteur était blessé, mais il n'a pas pris la fuite pour autant. Il s'est battu jusqu'au bout avant de se replier... dans les ténèbres... » {n}Kibellah ferme les yeux et sombre dans le silence, puis elle expire bruyamment et tend une griffe d'acier :{/n} « ... dans les ténèbres des tunnels de maintenance dissimulés derrière les cloisons du sanctuaire. »

languages.text: "Motife gelecek olursak..." {n}Kibellah, güç bela görülebilen kızıl damlaların oluşturduğu zinciri işaret ediyor.{/n} "Öfke ve çaresizlikle yapılmış. Bu motifi geride bırakan yaralı olsa da kaçmamış. Elinden geldiğince dövüşmüş ve ardından karanlığına doğru... Geri çekilmiş..." {n}Kibellah'nın gözleri kapanıyor, dudaklarından tek bir söz çıkmıyor. Ardından sert bir nefes alarak çelik bir pençeyi işaret ediyor.{/n} "Mabedin duvarlarında gizli bakım tünellerinin karanlığına çekilmiş..."
languages.original_text: "As for this pattern..." {n}Kibellah points to a barely visible chain of scarlet droplets.{/n} "It was made in fury and desperation. The one who left it was wounded, but they did not flee. They fought back while they could, and then they retreated... into the darkness..." {n}Kibellah's eyes close and she falls silent, then she exhales sharply and points a steel claw:{/n} "...into the darkness of the maintenance tunnels hidden within the walls of the shrine."
